title: Harboring Hannah: A SANCTUM Novel
description: Could the Daddy of her fantasies help Hannah make her dreams come true?Hannah Tobler has a bad habit of running from her problems.  It’s not that she wants to leave, she doesn’t see any other options.When Deke Brennan finds the perfect boat and the Little girl he knows is his, he makes plans to take both back to SANCTUM.  There, he knows each will find a safe harbor.
author: Pepper North
